title: Ayala Malls Cinemas stage K-wave movies | The Manila Times
text: The film fest happened at Glorietta, TriNoma, Ayala Malls Manila Bay, Centrio, Ayala Malls Capitol Central and Ayala MarQuee Mall. CONTRIBUTED PHOTO IT was some serious laughing, screaming and kilig-tears when the best of K-films at Ayala Malls Cinemas' "Korean Film Festival: Seoul Spotlight" ran from Sept. 20 to 27.
